/* USE : VerAddrMapper.getList */
SELECT tcpv.VER_SER_NO, tcpv.VER_SER_NM, tcpv.FILE_DESC, tcpv.FILE_SIZE, tcpv.FILE_DIR, tcpv.PROG_FG, tcpv.PGM_YN, tcpv.DB_YN, tcpv.IMG_YN, tcpv.USE_YN, tcpv.REG_DT, tcpv.REG_ID, tcpv.MOD_DT, tcpv.MOD_ID, tcpvs.REG_CNT, tcpvs.RECV_CNT
FROM TB_CM_POS_ADDR_VERSN tcpv, ( SELECT VER_SER_NO, NVL(SUM(DECODE(VER_RECV_FG, '1', 1, '2', 1, 0)), 0) REG_CNT, NVL(SUM(DECODE(VER_RECV_FG, '2', 1, 0)), 0) RECV_CNT FROM TB_CM_POS_ADDR_VERSN_STORE
WHERE STORE_CD IN (SELECT tms.STORE_CD FROM TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD =#{hqOfficeCd})
GROUP BY VER_SER_NO ) tcpvs
WHERE tcpvs.VER_SER_NO = tcpv.VER_SER_NO
WHERE tcpvs.VER_SER_NO (+)= tcpv.VER_SER_NO
AND tcpv.VER_SER_NO LIKE '%' || #{verSerNo} || '%'
AND tcpv.VER_SER_NM LIKE '%' || #{verSerNm} || '%'
AND tcpv.FILE_DESC = #{fileDesc}
ORDER BY tcpv.REG_DT DESC

/* USE : VerAddrMapper.dtlInfo */ SELECT tcpv.VER_SER_NO, tcpv.VER_SER_NM, tcpv.FILE_DIR, tcpv.FILE_NM, tcpv.FILE_EXT, tcpv.FILE_NM || '.' || FILE_EXT AS FILE_TOT_NM, tcpv.FILE_SIZE, tcpv.FILE_MIME_TYPE, tcpv.FILE_ORG_NM, tcpv.FILE_DESC, tcpv.PROG_FG, tcpv.PGM_YN, tcpv.DB_YN, tcpv.IMG_YN, tcpv.DEL_YN, tcpv.USE_YN, tcpv.REG_DT, tcpv.REG_ID FROM TB_CM_POS_ADDR_VERSN tcpv WHERE tcpv.VER_SER_NO = #{verSerNo} AND tcpv.DEL_YN = 'N'

/* USE : VerAddrMapper.storeList */ SELECT tcpvs.VER_SER_NO, tcpvs.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tms.SYS_STAT_FG, tms.CLS_FG, tcpvs.VER_RECV_FG, tcpvs.VER_RECV_DT, tcpvs.POS_IP, tcpvs.REG_DT, tcpvs.REG_ID, tcpvs.MOD_DT, tcpvs.MOD_ID
FROM TB_CM_POS_ADDR_VERSN_STORE tcpvs, TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tms.STORE_CD = tcpvs.STORE_CD AND tcpvs.VER_SER_NO = #{verSerNo}

/* USE : VerAddrMapper.srchStoreList */ SELECT tms.STORE_CD, tms.SYS_STAT_FG, tms.VAN_CD, tms.CLS_FG, tms.STORE_NM, tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM, tcp.LAST_VER_SER_NO, tmp.POS_CNT FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_HQ_OFFICE tho, ( SELECT STORE_CD, MAX(VER_SER_NO) AS LAST_VER_SER_NO FROM TB_CM_POS_ADDR_VERSN_STORE GROUP BY STORE_CD ) tcp, ( SELECT STORE_CD, COUNT(POS_NO) AS POS_CNT FROM TB_MS_POS WHERE USE_YN ='Y' GROUP by STORE_CD ) tmp WHERE tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmp.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD
AND tms.STORE_CD IN (SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_CM_POS_ADDR_VERSN_STORE WHERE VER_SER_NO = #{verSerNo} )
AND tms.STORE_CD NOT IN (SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_CM_POS_ADDR_VERSN_STORE WHERE VER_SER_NO = #{verSerNo} )
AND tcp.STORE_CD (+)= tms.STORE_CD
AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%'|| #{hqOfficeNm} ||'%'
AND tms.STORE_CD LIKE '%'|| #{storeCd}||'%'
AND tms.STORE_CD IN (${storeCdQuery})
AND tms.STORE_NM LIKE '%'|| #{storeNm} ||'%'
AND tms.SYS_STAT_FG = #{sysStatFg}
ORDER BY HQ_OFFICE_CD, STORE_CD
